name: Simplicant
tag_list: social-recruiting, hiring, team-building, talent-acquisition, hiring-collaboration, recruitment, careers-site, workflow, jobs-publishing, analytics, intuitive, mobile-apps
overview: Simplicant is a next generation, cloud-based talent acquisition and social recruiting platform to target and effectively engage talent. Simplicant’s recruiting platform brings agility, efficiency and relevance to the process of sourcing and building great teams, transforming the way companies approach talent acquisition. We provide growing organizations with recruiting capabilities that help them to compete and win in an environment that is intensely competitive and hungry for top talent.
